text: Ezɨ kɨ ia bagha Godɨn kam ko mɨgɨa kamaghɨn azangsɨsi, a ian akuragh gavgavim ia danɨngtɨ, ia arazir aghuiba bar dar amu, egh an ifongiamɨn gɨn mangam. Eghtɨ Krais Iesusɨn ingangarimɨn tuavimɨn, a en navir averiabar aven ingartɨ, e a ifongezir arazibar amuam. Egh e zurazurara ziar ekiam a danɨng mamaghɨra ikiam. Bar guizbangɨra.
